welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fuchu, Japan! Explore our charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic temples, and traditional festivals. We hope you enjoy your time here and discover all that Fuchu has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Yokota AFB Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal dedicated to low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
